name: @neoncity/common-js
description: Things shared between packages. Isomorphic, of course.
author: NeonCity team

scripts.test-with-coverage: webpack && istanbul cover --config ./.istanbul.yml ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- out/tests.js && remap-istanbul -i ./out/coverage/coverage-final.json -o ./out/coverage/coverage-remapped.json && coverage-filter -i ./out/coverage/coverage-remapped.json -o ./out/coverage/coverage-filtered.json
